author: rbb
msg: Fix the signalling logic for Apache 2.0.  The removed code used to block
all signals sent to an APR process.  This logic is left over from APR the
APR signals code which was removed a while ago.  If APR doesn't have
signalling code, then we shouldn't be blocking signals.

author: dreid
msg: This commit gets mm running on BeOS.  With this BeOS APR once more
compiles and builds cleanly.  Not sure if this is how to update mm, but

author: dreid
msg: Remove the stated lines from readwrite.c to bring BeOS back in line

author: rbb
msg: Re-structure APR's configure.in file.  This should make adding functions to
APR easier.  Basically, I just moved things around a bit to make them easier
to find, and I added some output.

author: stoddard
msg: Very minor performance tweak. Do not copy header/trailer buffer if there is
